metadata.title: CVE-2020-13790 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libjpeg-turbo 2.0.4, and mozjpeg 4.0.0, has a heap-based buffer over-readin get_rgb_row() in rdppm.c via a malformed PPM input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13790` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.4
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.4
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.4
libturbojpeg - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-0ubuntu3.4').
